word: SISTER WHITE FURTHER TOLD OF HOW SHE WAS CALLED UPON REPEATEDLY TO MEET THIS FANATICISM SQUARELY AND TO REBUKE IT STERNLY IN THE NAME OF THE LORD. SHE EMPHASIZED THE FACT THAT WE HAVE A GREAT WORK TO DO IN THE WORLD, THAT OUR STRENGTH WITH THE PEOPLE LIES IN THE POWER THAT ACCOMPANIES A CLEAR PRESENTATION OF THE WORD OF THE LIVING GOD. THE LAW OF JEHOVAH IS TO BE EXALTED AND MADE HONORABLE; AND THE VARIOUS FEATURES OF THE THIRD ANGEL'S MESSAGE ARE TO BE PLAINLY OUTLINED BEFORE THE PEOPLE THAT ALL MAY HAVE AN OPPORTUNITY TO HEAR THE TRUTH FOR THIS TIME AND TO DECIDE WHETHER TO OBEY GOD RATHER THAN MAN.
